name: Chess in Ohio
description:
Chess but every 5 turn a new rule is added.

Left-click and dragging to move chess pieces. Right-click to open Action Menu (Currently Info and Move not yet implemented).

To play LAN game, search the host's IPv4 address and put in Client's connection field.

Current version: v0.4

Current number of rules: 6.

Game does not included check for checkmate (because of the extra rules) so be careful with your King.
